title: Amistad National Recreation Area: Freshwater Plants
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Plants     Freshwater Plants                Freshwater Plants         NPS Photo  Lake Amistad is home to several species of aquatic plants. Pondweed and Hydrilla are the most common, seen in abundance around the edge of the lake. They provide shelter for the young fish and invertebrates that feed the trophy bass our visiting fishermen catch.
